    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The European Countries 2</string>
            <string language="en">The European Countries 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Europäischen Länder 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Pays Européens 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Países Europeus 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Paesi Europei 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ευρωπαϊκές χώρες 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Países Europeos 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you are supposed to recognize the English names and place them in the right European country. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you åre supposed to recognize the English names and place them in the right European country. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">Europe</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier Sie åre die Englischnamen erkennen und sie 
in das rechte europäische Land legen gesollt worden. Enthält 
Ton und Text. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - 
Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici vous åre censé pour identifier les noms de 
l'anglais et pour les placer dans le pays européen droit. 
Contient le bruit et le texte. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour des débutants - module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você åre suposto para reconhecer os nomes 
do inglês e para colocá-los no país europeu direito. Contem  
o som e o texto. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para
novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui voi åre supposto per riconoscere i nomi di 
inglese e per disporli nel paese europeo di destra. Contiene sia
il suono che il testo. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εre υποθέσατε να αναγνωρίσετε τα αγγλικά 
ονόματα και να τα τοποθετήσετε στη σωστή ευρωπαϊκή χώρα. 
Περιέχει και τον ήχο και το κείμενο. Safir - 
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2
- πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted åre supuesto para reconocer los 
nombres del inglés y para ponerlos en el país europeo derecho. 
Contiene el sonido y el texto. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
